basic_information.scholarship_notes: The initial gift will be $100,000. Equal portions will be distributed annually until the completion of the gift, awarding up to 5 individuals annually.

description: This scholarship was established in 2020 by Maja Kristin. Preference will be given to students who participate in UCO Department of Dance's performing companies which include but are not limited to, Kaleidoscope Dance Company, students involved with student groups in the Office of Diversity and Inclusion and students who are former scholarship recipients. Eligibility Dance Major Enrolled full-time Sophomore, junior, senior, or graduate student Minimum 2.8 GPA Requirements Personal artist statement (250 words) Official transcript

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration
